tweets.text: Thanks @SOPH_C_ You did the local community proud - represented us & the issue well. The filming speaks for itself. Waste mountain next to houses = health hazard @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/jQpaw0s8Jz

@CleanPlanetTod1 @GlosCC @ViridorUK @BristolAvonRT @Southsomersetdc @severnrivers @KevinsDoherty1 Good morning Clean Planet Today, the area is looking much better after our team-mates pulled together to clean up the litter. Here are a few shots from yesterday: https://t.co/DW5NTrecfX

I have formally complained to the @EnvAgency that their inaction early on has led to harm to the health me personally and the community. And who is to say there won‚Äôt be longer term harm? @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/Yuiqq2DFO9

@EnvAgency @PHE_uk @DHSCgovuk @MattHancock take a good look at this. @PHE_uk how dare you say the health affects due toxic polluted air are only transient they are long term and fatal. We living near #WalleysQuarry demand action. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #EarthDay2021 #EarthDay https://t.co/nXiHGG6tKe

tweets.text: Good to get the perspective of people from out of the area. Workmen leave the area with really bad headaches which clear once they leave the area. The facts speak for themselves. Newcastle has become a biohazard @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @dpcarrington https://t.co/soI2M18Akj

@SevernUnlocked @severnrivers @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA @fishmigration @Shoal_Org Awesome. Look forwards to seeing that one. Went to Bevere one recently. How far are the other two off? https://t.co/NC8LBImH3Y
@SevernUnlocked @severnrivers @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA @fishmigration @Shoal_Org Fabulous job!

A great day of JESIP training with excellent speakers and discussions. It was really good to have so many different agencies represented. @jesip999 @cheshirepolice @CheshireFire @NWAmbulance @Go_CheshireWest @CheshireEast @EnvAgencyNW @DefenceHQ @NHSuk @PHE_uk @BTP https://t.co/vqm5QsXn6F

@SevernUnlocked @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgencyMids @DaveThroupEA @fishmigration @Shoal_Org So great to see this in action after so much hard work over the last few years. A great team effort. Thank you all!

The figures are truly disgusting and almost unimaginable. But even our little Brook is not immune from misconnections, sewage overflows - and rainwater runoffs need to be filtered. Much to do @EnvAgency @Feargal_Sharkey https://t.co/QAAKpd69tK
